meanings.definition: Not situated or growing on an axis.
meanings.sent1: The abaxile leaf grew freely without being attached to any stem.
meanings.sent2: The plant's abaxile branches spread out in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The abaxile flower decided to take a break from the usual stem life.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were abaxile, floating aimlessly without a central idea.
meanings.sent5: The abaxile clouds scattered across the sky, not following any specific path.

meanings.sent1: The abaxile wheel wobbled uncontrollably due to its lack of a central axis.
meanings.sent2: The abaxile sphere rolled unpredictably in all directions.
meanings.sent3: The abaxile compass got lost and couldn't find its way back.
meanings.sent4: His abaxile thoughts spun around without a clear direction.
meanings.sent5: The abaxile kite flew erratically, unable to stay steady in the wind.

meanings.sent1: The abaxile crystal had no defined center point.
meanings.sent2: The abaxile object rotated freely without a central pivot.
meanings.sent3: The abaxile clock hands refused to point to any specific hour.
meanings.sent4: Her abaxile dance moves were graceful yet lacked a central focus.
meanings.sent5: The abaxile satellite orbited the planet without a fixed axis of rotation.
